binding:binding.name: Free@Home Binding
binding:binding.description:
This binding connects to Busch-Jaeger Free@Home Home Automation system and supports gateway connection via bridge, scene activation, raffstore/shutter control (incl. raffstore groups), switch, dimmer, virtual switch, presence detection, thermostat, window sensors, 4.3" touch with thermostat, 7" panel with door opener functionality, weather station and discovery.
Events of the physical devices are fed back to binding. Binding is based on XMPP.rocks (Websocket) that is used to connect to system access point. Thanks to Christian Schudt (Babbler) for help with customizing code for XMPP over websocket.
Disclaimer: This binding is a private contribution and is not an official Busch-Jaeger product.
binding:binding.author: Stian Kjoglum
